"Alice":
"Can you hear me? It seems that even
for the virtual space, there is no
communication issue from outside."

"Since the communication is alright, let's
see the degree of realness that can be
created."

"Well, that is one objective which I will
check.
Alright, please begin."

"聞こえるかしら？
どうやら、仮想空間でも
外からの通信は問題ないようね。"

"通信も有効なんて、一体どこまで
リアルに作られているのかしら。"

"ま、それを調べるのも目的の一つね。
それじゃ、始めてちょうだい。"
